page.title: 14TRADE
page.content: Trade. Both Nawton and Wombleton have a village shop which is seen to be valuable for the purchase of everyday items. A small shop selling children's clothing recently opened in Nawton. It replaced a butcher's shop. Villagers do their weekly shopping increasingly at large supermarkets in Pickering, Malton and York. Kirkbymoorside and Helmsley have weekly markets which attract a large number of villagers. Mobile vans selling meat, bread and groceries tour the area and provide an important service especially for the elderly and those without transport.
